div.p: Hermias, son of Hermias, Πέρσης τῆς ἐπιγονῆς, to Leon, son of Orsenouphis, greetings. I declare that I have received from you the three metretes of wine, including the half thereof, which I shall pay back to you in the month of Epeiph of the third year from my own vintage, new, good wine with the measure with which I usually pour out. If, however, I do not pay it back as is written, I shall pay you three thousand copper drachmas for each keramion as fine. This document shall be valid wherever it may be produced. In the third year, the ninth Pachon. Translation: P.David 4
